title: Mpox
description: Mpox is a viral disease that can be spread between people or between people and certain animals.
cleaned_text: is being restructured to improve the quality of information. If you cannot find the information you're looking for, please use the search bar or search for archived materials on [archive.cdc.gov](https://archive.cdc.gov/). Get Both Doses of the Mpox Vaccine Vaccination is an important tool in preventing the spread of mpox. The vaccine may still protect against severe illness, hospitalization, and death. Get vaccinated with both doses of the vaccine for the best protection.
